WaveNight.Night_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="314d6d9b98ab4041a32d61ac9de65e36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Ojo con las formas de vida nocturnas!
WaveNight.Night_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3eddca82a614b5db7471e724a71080e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Necesitarás más Pikmin luminosos...
WaveNight.Night_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="36c3635912e54ed4a53a737051b5c576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]¡Protege esa lumiloma, savia nueva!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1c72050f0b2f48159a34926701fdba5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A más Pikmin luminosos, mayor protección.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1ea9bcb13de7426ab841038ee72330e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Las bestias furiosas atacan las lumilomas.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c080130754ad4307a6cd9499777ff4d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Ataca con las [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cargas cegadoras[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="adda7d97d11b4cd08f29513fbbc88186" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Usa las señuelomas... como [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]señuelo[System:Color name="Default"], je, je.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d9087fd455cd408699a398a8da00d89b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]El [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar nocturno señala [System:Color name="Default"]cada lumiloma.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="eb49fe3b1be24cb9986d6ef50661005c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]El radar [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]te señala[System:Color name="Default"] las criaturas furiosas.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_06: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="26e4e00b015c4175bee4876f402bd901" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Aprovecha los [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Objetos[System:Color name="Default"] de tu inventario!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="64aa79119f0945e492c99da95574b1ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡Que [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] ayude a proteger la lumiloma!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_08: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6c7ce8ffe6194868bf744f45899a7ad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Cada [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]semilla luminosa[System:Color name="Default"], ¡un Pikmin luminoso!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_09: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="25f223e511e5475bb0a9dc7ed1970b75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alterna unidades para dividir el trabajo.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="70338dde45e545e3b2e16baf384f1415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Envía a tu acompañante a la lumiloma[System:Color name="Default"].
Puedes hacerlo con la acción «Petición».
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_11: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="51e2f00fe7cb4c2d9ebc46a018a7442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Si hay 2 lumilomas, ¡reparte el trabajo!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_12: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2079dc98dabb4f0da05285e72c899bf3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Vence enemigos antes de que enfurezcan.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4b268fd0633341adacf2c88de879df36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]No sufras si pierdes Pikmin luminosos.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Se vuelven luz y regresan a las lumilomas.
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPLow_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0e5684c9edd04326ac5dc1f5b98c7c3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Aguanta; ¡la noche siempre llega a su fin!
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5416b0302fbc49cd925d89ce42ef0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡Esto aún no ha terminado!
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c4e6b9ef56004505a3e08ab0a673907d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Quieres que amanezca ya, ¿eh? Je, je, je...
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="53ac734631bf42bd83adb8f5a02fcd66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡No pierdas de vista la lumiloma!
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ef34a0d9838f48ce830777f5c24b4905" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Observa al enemigo en el [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar nocturno[System:Color name="Default"]...
Lo verás en la parte inferior de la pantalla.
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c882faab539b4a13bf565cf0f52dcb93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]¿Tienes suficientes Pikmin luminosos?
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a8612a770fa8474aacb3eec0c8a70958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]¡Protege la lumiloma como sea!
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b580a64b7a7a44aaa9ae3a3c178aee83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] te puede ayudar con la defensa!
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d259e4c2d0b34dd0b54c088bf665e626" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¿Bien de Pikmin luminosos? ¡A defender!
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4490532de2c64a14935d6d1a2c4183bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Las bestias se inquietan...
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Protege la lumiloma!
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1ed55af054494073a59f5e368764a745" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]¡Las bestias se han enfurecido!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]¡Que no destruyan la lumiloma!

WaveNight.Night_Announce_InvasionWasurena_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bdd47c3ca7094adda5916489fc98fb28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]¡Cuidado con la [Grammar:Decap/][Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/]!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]¡Rápido! ¡Ocúpate de las bestias!
WaveNight.Night_Announce_InvasionWasurena_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="128ac0a9313c4450a36ccf169a3f50e1" Scale="0.982659"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]¡Están atacando la [Grammar:Decap/][Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/]!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]¡Rápido! ¡Tienes que protegerla!
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Discovery_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0d289d81b7ce4d4aab464c0a66d3b267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oooh, se ha encendido...
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="499dd4f2b06843da8ef71c3c4941d4b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]¡Están atacando una señueloma!
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e00addd510d4d2d8fd20bd847dcf603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]¡Una señueloma está siendo atacada!
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0050ecc827754c3880da163e036c65f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]¡Esa bestia quiere destruir la señueloma!
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="89566f874de94e0485764ba2e85fcd18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Uy, han destrozado la señueloma...
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="539b1fe553ee4c5fac27fe9a3f6e8a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oooh, han destruido la señueloma...
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a3b6d139d7a8442a9e7bb3532ec0c083" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Han echado abajo la señueloma...
WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="cf2b15a1e97d4f93b89f53aae0d48ee0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Está a punto de amanecer.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Aguanta ahí, je, je, je!
WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5b872f5a0a774870b61041be6c90e485" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Ya no queda nada para que llegue el alba!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]¡Venga, que lo consigues!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6960a91d798f40eb9c06fb28bdb0e27c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ay, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...

[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Descansa hasta que [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] vuelva.
WaveNight.Night_FirstDeadHikariPikmin: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="219be60e51274f5786583d15ef753fc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Has perdido algún Pikmin luminoso...
WaveNight.Night_HikariPikmin_AttributeDamage: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6f6dd9d0962b4df3ab779c78577eba74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]¡Eso no afecta a los Pikmin luminosos!
WaveNight.Night_EncountChappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3ca31d8ac8845eb9374d7c1768846ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Esa forma de vida autóctona es enorme...
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Lánzale una [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Carga cegadora[System:Color name="Default"] con [PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/] ([PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/])!
WaveNight.Night_Underwater_HikariStation: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b93ece3af4d94ca4ae1e2da7696c0113" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Mira! ¡Píldoras lumínicas en el agua!
WaveNight.Night_EncountTateanaBaby: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1513fe331f974f388a8d10e17186166f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Destruye el nido para que no salgan más.
